problem.markdown: A closed system contains water, initially at 1 MPa saturated liquid, executes an adiabatic process to its final state of 1 MPa dry saturated vapour. The process is quasi-static and isobaric. Which of the following is true? [x] The process is possible, it does not violate the Second Law. [ ] The process is not possible, since a process cannot be both adiabatic and isobaric [x] The process is isobaric, isothermal, as well as adiabatic. [ ] The process violated the Second Law.
